TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed JumpList extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public NotInheritable Class JumpList Implements ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示作为菜单显示在 Windows 7 任务栏按钮上的项和任务的列表。

span.span: Represents a list of items and tasks displayed as a menu on a Windows 7 taskbar button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]任务栏提供了用于直接从任务栏按钮启动程序，通过使用跳转列表的增强的功能。The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar provides enhanced functionality for starting programs directly from the taskbar button by using Jump Lists. 跳转列表也用在[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]开始菜单。Jump Lists are also used in the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] Start menu. 通过右击任务栏按钮或通过单击开始菜单中的某个程序旁边的箭头访问跳转列表。You access a Jump List by right-clicking a taskbar button or by clicking the arrow next to a program in the Start menu. 有关跳转列表的详细信息，请参阅[任务栏](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178478)的 Windows 用户体验交互准则的部分。For more information about Jump Lists, see the [Taskbar](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178478) section of the Windows User Experience Interaction Guidelines. 类提供托管的包装中的跳转列表功能[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]任务栏和管理的数据传递给[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]shell。The class provides a managed wrapper for the Jump List functionality in the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar and manages the data passed to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 公开的功能类不可用的版本中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]早于[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]。The functionality exposed by the class is not available in versions of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] earlier than [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]. 应用程序使用类将运行的其他版本中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]，但不是能跳转列表。Applications that use the class will run in other versions of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)], but the Jump List will not be available. 有关 Windows 外壳程序和本机跳转列表 Api 的详细信息，请参阅[任务栏扩展](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479)。For more information about the Windows shell and native Jump List APIs, see [Taskbar Extensions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479). 下图显示跳转列表 Windows Media Player，与中的项**任务**和**常用**类别。The following illustration shows the Jump List for Windows Media Player, with items in the **Tasks** and **Frequent** categories. ![Windows Media Player 跳跃菜单](~/add/media/wpfshell-jumplist.png "Windows Media Player 跳跃菜单")![Windows Media Player Jump List](~/add/media/wpfshell-jumplist.png "Windows Media Player Jump List") Windows Media Player 跳跃菜单Windows Media Player Jump List ## 配置跳转列表Configuring a Jump List 跳转列表可以包含两种类型的项，和。Jump Lists can contain two types of items, a and a . A是程序的链接和是指向文件的链接。A is a link to a program and a is a link to a file. 你可以直观地分隔跳转列表中的项，通过创建没有和指定。You can visually separate items in a Jump List by creating a that does not have a and specified. 此空将显示为水平线跳转列表中。This empty will be displayed as a horizontal line in the Jump List. > [!NOTE] > 如果在指定的文件类型未注册到你的应用程序，该文件将不会出现在跳转列表中。If the type of the file specified in a is not registered with your application, the file will not appear in the Jump List. 例如，如果你添加指向.txt 文件，必须注册你的应用程序用于处理.txt 文件。For example, if you add a that points to a .txt file, your application must be registered to handle .txt files. 有关详细信息，请参阅[简介文件关联](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178480)。For more information, see [Introduction to File Associations](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178480). 跳转项放置到中的类别。Jump items are placed into categories in the . 默认情况下，中显示**任务**类别。By default, a is displayed in the **Tasks** category. 或者，您可以指定为。Alternatively, you can specify a for the . 你可以指定是否标准**最近**和**常用**类别将显示在通过设置和属性。You can specify whether the standard **Recent** and **Frequent** categories are displayed in the by setting the and properties. 这些类别的内容管理的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]shell。The contents of these categories are managed by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 因为这些类别中可能包含许多相同的数据，通常显示一个或另一个在你，但不是两者。Because these categories might contain much of the same data, you typically display one or the other in your , but not both. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 自动管理最近使用的项目，如果它们是通过通用文件对话框打开还是用来打开通过文件类型关联的应用程序。 automatically manages recent items if they are opened through a common file dialog box or used to open an application through file type association. 通过跳转列表访问某一项，可以通知[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]外壳程序以向其中添加项**最近**通过调用类别方法。When an item is accessed through the Jump List, you can notify the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell to add the item to the **Recent** category by calling the method. ## 将跳转列表应用于 Windows ShellApplying a Jump List to the Windows Shell 不能直接访问 shell 的跳转列表或其内容读入类。You cannot access the shell’s Jump List directly or read its contents into the class. 相反，类提供的表示形式跳转的列表，你可以使用，以及然后将应用于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]shell。Instead, the class provides a representation of a Jump List that you can work with, and then apply to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 通常创建并将其设置一次当首次运行应用程序。You typically create a and set it one time when the application is first run. 但是，你可以修改或替换在运行时。However, you can modify or replace the at run time. 当已设置属性，你必须应用到其内容显示在任务栏跳转列表中之前的 Windows 外壳。When you have set the properties, you must apply the to the Windows shell before its contents appear in the taskbar Jump List. 这自动完成时首次附加到的应用程序，在 XAML 中或在调用方法。This is done automatically when the is first attached to an application, either in XAML or in a call to the method. 如果修改的内容在运行时，必须调用方法将其当前的内容应用到 Windows 外壳程序。If you modify the contents of the at run time, you must call the method to apply its current contents to the Windows shell. ## 在 XAML 中设置跳转列表Setting a Jump List in XAML A不会自动附加到对象。A is not automatically attached to an object. 您附加到使用附加的属性的语法通过 XAML 中的对象。You attach a to an object in XAML by using the attached property syntax. 类实现接口以支持的 XAML 声明。The class implements the interface to support XAML declaration of a . 如果在 XAML 中声明并在附加到当前，它将自动应用于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]shell 时初始化。If the is declared in XAML and attached to the current , it is automatically applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell when the is initialized. ## 设置和修改代码中的跳转列表Setting and Modifying a Jump List in Code 您附加到对象在代码中通过调用静态方法。You attach a to an object in code by calling the static method. 这也适用到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]shell。This also applies the to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 若要修改在运行时，调用方法以获取当前相连。To modify a at run time, you call the method to get the that is currently attached to an . 已修改的属性后，必须调用方法以将更改应用于 Windows 外壳程序。After you have modified the properties of the , you must call the method to apply the changes to the Windows shell. > [!NOTE] > 你通常创建一个附加到并应用于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]shell。You typically create one that is attached to the and applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 但是，你可以创建多个对象。However, you can create multiple objects. 只有一个一次可应用于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]shell，并只有一个一次可以关联。Only one at a time can be applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell, and only one at a time can be associated with an . .NET Framework 不需要这些是相同。The .NET Framework does not require that these be the same . > [!NOTE] > 此类包含在类级别应用于所有成员的链接要求。This class contains a link demand at the class level that applies to all members. A直接调用方没有完全信任权限时，将引发。A is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[的继承需求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。For more information about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9). ## Examples 下面的示例演示具有跳转列表的应用程序。The following example shows an application with a Jump List. 该应用程序，可以将任务添加到当前的跳转列表，请清除的跳转列表中，内容，将新的跳转列表应用于应用程序的三个按钮。The application has three buttons that enable you to add a task to the current Jump List, clear the contents of the Jump List, and apply a new Jump List to the application. 下面的示例演示如何声明标记中。The following example shows how to declare a in markup. 包含两个链接和一个。The contains two links and one . 应用到外壳程序将失败如果应用程序未注册用于处理.txt 文件扩展名。Applying the to the shell will fail if the application is not registered to handle the .txt file name extension. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#000](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#000)] 下面的示例演示的代码隐藏页`App.xaml`。The following example shows the code-behind page for `App.xaml`. 此代码处理和事件。This code handles the and events. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml.cs#100)] 下面的示例演示用于创建应用程序用户界面的标记。The following example shows the markup used to create the application user interface. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#300](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#300)] 下面的示例演示的代码隐藏页`MainWindow.xaml`。The following example shows the code-behind page for `MainWindow.xaml`. 此代码演示如何修改、 清除和创建在程序代码中。This code demonstrates how to modify, clear, and create a in procedural code. 有关新跳转列表，静态调用方法将关联与当前的应用程序并应用到 Windows 外壳程序。For the new Jump List, the static method is called to associate the with the current application and apply the to the Windows shell. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#200](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#200)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks **最近**和**常用**类别通常包含许多相同的跳转项。The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items. 因此，应用程序通常显示**最近**或**常用**跳转列表中，但不同时的类别。As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both.

summary.span: 将指定的项路径添加到跳转列表的“最近”类别中。

span.span: Adds the specified item path to the **Recent** category of the Jump List.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容**最近**类别由 Windows 外壳程序。The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell. 若要跳转列表中显示最近使用的项，请设置属性`true`。To display recently used items in the Jump List, set the property to `true`. 你可以调用方法来请求 Windows 外壳程序添加到项路径**最近**项列表。You can call the method to request that the Windows shell add an item path to the **Recent** items list. 如果你的应用程序未注册为处理的项的文件类型，它将不会出现在**最近**列表和对调用将以静默方式失败。If your application is not registered to handle the file type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to will fail silently.

permission.span: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可发送的内容到 Windows 外壳程序在其当前状态。The method sends the content of the to the Windows shell in its current state. 此调用完成后，属性修改为包含 Windows 外壳程序已成功添加到其任务栏跳转列表中的项目。After this call is complete, the property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its taskbar Jump List. 你可以通过事件处理程序中访问删除的项的列表和事件。You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the and events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取当前和清除的内容集合。The following example shows how to get the current and clear the contents of the collection. 然后调用方法来应用更改为 Windows 外壳程序。The method is then called to apply the changes to the Windows shell. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#230](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#230)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以调用方法以获取当前与关联。You can call the method to get the currently associated with an . .NET Framework 不需要，这是，当前应用于 Windows 外壳程序。The .NET Framework does not require that this be the that is currently applied to the Windows shell. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取与当前的应用程序关联。The following example shows how to get the associated with the current application. A添加到集合并添加到**最近**类别。A is added to the collection and added to the **Recent** category. 调用方法来应用更新到 Windows 外壳程序。The method is called to apply the updated to the Windows shell. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跳转列表可以包含两种类型的项，和。Jump Lists can contain two types of items, a and a . A是程序的链接和是指向文件的链接。A is a link to a program and a is a link to a file. 当创建后，集合为空。When a is created, the collection is empty. 可以添加任何或到集合的对象。You can add any or objects to the collection. 集合将只包含已通过您的程序添加的项。The collection will only contain items that have been added by your program. 后通过成功调用传递给 Windows shell或方法，集合将包含已成功添加到任务栏跳转列表的项。After the has been passed to the Windows shell by a successful call to either the or methods, the collection will contain only the items that were successfully added to the taskbar Jump List. 未成功添加的项会从集合。Items that were not successfully added are removed from the collection. 你可以通过事件处理程序中访问删除的项的列表和事件。You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the and events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取当前和清除的内容集合。The following example shows how to get the current and clear the contents of the collection. 然后调用方法来应用更改为 Windows 外壳程序。The method is then called to apply the changes to the Windows shell. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#230](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#230)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event JumpItemsRejected As EventHandler(Of JumpItemsRejectedEventArgs)

summary.span: 在 Windows shell 将跳转项添加到跳转列表中失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when jump items are not successfully added to the Jump List by the Windows shell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容后适用于 Windows shell 中，属性修改为包含 Windows 外壳程序已成功添加到跳转列表中的项目。After the contents of the are applied to the Windows shell, the property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List. 你可以通过事件处理程序中访问删除的项的列表和事件。You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the and events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理事件以在消息框中显示被拒绝的项。The following example shows how to handle the event to display the rejected items in a message box. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容后适用于 Windows shell 中，属性修改为包含 Windows 外壳程序已成功添加到跳转列表中的项目。After the contents of the are applied to the Windows shell, the property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List. 你可以通过事件处理程序中访问删除的项的列表和事件。You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the and events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理事件以在消息框中显示被拒绝的项。The following example shows how to handle the event to display the rejected items in a message box. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以创建多个对象。You can create multiple objects. 但是，只有一个一次可以关联。However, only one at a time can be associated with an . 调用方法以设置当前与关联。Call the method to set the currently associated with an . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建在代码中。The following example shows how to create a in code. 静态调用方法将关联与当前的应用程序。The static method is called to associate the with the current application. 设置时自动应用于 Windows 外壳程序。The is automatically applied to the Windows shell when it is set. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowFrequentCategory { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示常用项是否显示在跳转列表中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List.

value.span: 如果常用项显示在跳转列表中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容**常用**类别由 Windows 外壳程序。The contents of the **Frequent** category are managed by the Windows shell. 若要跳转列表中显示经常使用的项目，请设置属性`true`。To display frequently used items in the Jump List, set the property to `true`. **最近**和**常用**类别通常包含许多相同的跳转项。The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items. 因此，应用程序通常显示**最近**或**常用**跳转列表中，但不同时的类别。As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both. ## Examples 下面的示例演示配置为显示**常用**类别。The following example shows a configured to show the **Frequent** category. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#001](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#001)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowRecentCategory { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示最近使用的项是否显示在跳转列表中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether recently used items are displayed in the Jump List.

value.span: 如果最近使用的项显示在跳转列表中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if recently used items are displayed in the Jump List; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容**最近**类别由 Windows 外壳程序。The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell. 若要跳转列表中显示经常使用的项目，请设置属性`true`。To display frequently used items in the Jump List, set the property to `true`. **最近**和**常用**类别通常包含许多相同的跳转项。The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items. 因此，应用程序通常显示**最近**或**常用**跳转列表中，但不同时的类别。As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both. 你可以调用方法来请求 Windows 外壳程序添加到的项**最近**项列表。You can call the method to request that the Windows shell add items to the **Recent** items list. 如果你的应用程序未注册要处理的项的文件名类型，它将不会出现在**最近**列表和对调用将以静默方式失败。If your application is not registered to handle the file name type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to will fail silently. ## Examples 下面的示例演示配置为显示**最近**类别。The following example shows a configured to show the **Recent** category. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#001](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#001)]
